Vamprah::

"Just we have to fix some details in order to start my undewrcover 
mission" said Vamprah with a beauty smile to the males "How maximals 
will find my pod? how we can avoid that other factions capture my pod 
and the most important how I'll leave the base in case that maximals 
discover me?"


--- In nbwrpg@y..., Alloran2@a... wrote:
> :::Wheeljack:::
> 
> ::He nods to Composer::
> Wheeljack: Yes, that was her name.  She went to the Maximals with 
the story 
> that she had been attacked by the Alliance, and they took her in.  
Basically 
> it was Zardus' idea that she would use her seductive charm to get 
inside of 
> the Maximals, and though i have nothing against our leader, i think 
he made a 
> mistake.  Skulletron also perished.
> ::He turns to Vamprah::
> Wheeljack: Yes, i think you're ready to go. I hope you uncover a 
lot of info 
> about the new Maximal City.
